external_games.name: A Tale of Caos: Overture - Act II

name: A Tale of Caos: Overture - Act II
summary: An epic journey begins! Terry, a brilliant, messy girl, is beginning her greatest adventure, following her master, Albion McMaster, whose goals are quite dark and mysterious. With Heimlich, her mechanical owl and best friend, Terry will travel through amazing worlds and many unpredictable dangers!
